channel.title: CVE Feed for 3D Cover Carousel -- 3D Cover Carousel

item.title: CVE-2021-38318|2024-08-04T01:37:16.321Z -- 3d%20cover%20carousel -- 3d%20cover%20carousel
item.description: The 3D Cover Carousel WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the id parameter in the ~/cover-carousel.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
